name: @hunmer/mira-monorepo
description: Mira TypeScript project - monorepo with core, server, and plugins

scripts.clean: Remove-Item *\dist -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item *\node_modules -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ..\plugins\*\dist -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item ..\plugins\*\node_modules -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue

author: hunmer
